plays.text: Penalty to Saku Koivu 2  minutes for Tripping
Penalty to Cory Schneider 2  minutes for Delaying Game-Puck over glass(served by Jaromir Jagr)
Penalty to Stephen Gionta 2  minutes for Hooking
Even Strength Goal Scored by Michael Ryder assisted by Adam Henrique
Penalty to Hampus Lindholm 2  minutes for Holding
Even Strength Goal Scored by Cam Fowler assisted by Ben Lovejoy and Teemu Selanne
Bench penalty to New Jersey Devils 2  minutes for Too many men/ice - bench(served by Andrei Loktionov)
Penalty to Mark Fayne 2  minutes for Interference
Even Strength Goal Scored by Mathieu Perreault assisted by Kyle Palmieri and Teemu Selanne
Penalty to Mark Fistric 2  minutes for Interference
Powerplay Goal Scored by Andy Greene assisted by Jaromir Jagr and Travis Zajac
Even Strength Goal Scored by Kyle Palmieri assisted by Mathieu Perreault and Cam Fowler
